Summary: saw a bright red light that would turn orange/copper, then bright green, then back to red and glow bright with no other flashes or lights... kept during acrobatics in the sky.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around February 23rd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going to bed, it was about 2:15 am on Feb. 23rd... When i looked out my back window and saw a light appear. Im always looking outside because ive seen other lights in the past. So i kept starring at it and said to myself, "If that light does ANYTHING unusual, im grabbing my phone... and thats when i saw the light do a fast turn to the left, then straight up into the sky and dimmed out, then got really really bright red... hovered, then dropped really fast.. thats when i ran out of my back door and shot video of the light.
